author: Thomas Macaulay
title: How my first digital date helped me survive self-isolation
description:
Online dating is nothing new. But now it's the only dating.

So while couples face the terrifying prospect of being trapped at home together for weeks, singles either embrace solitude ...
content:
Online dating is nothing new. But now, its the only dating.
So while couples face the terrifying prospect of being trapped together for weeks, singles either embrace solitude or search for digital love.
I try the latter.
My online romance begins on Hinge, … [+5077 chars]
